name: Build and Delve
description:
Build and Delve is a deck-building roguelike in which you both create and explore a dungeon. You create the dungeon via deck-building: you use your cards to add monsters and treasure as well as to buy new cards. You explore the dungeon in classic roguelike fashion, with turn-based movement and lots of dice-rolling.

This game was created for the 7DRL Challenge between March 6 and March 12, 2021. It demonstrates the combination of two genres into one game, but the scope is limited. Additional features such as new cards, ranged weapons, and better monster AI could be added in future work.

Build and Delve is free software. The source code for the project can be found  at https://github.com/doctor-g/7DRL-2021.
